original: “Yaṁ pucchitañca vissajjitañcā”ti gāthā, ayaṁ vicayo hāro.
analyzed: yam pucchitam ca vissajjitam ca ati gāthā ayam vicayaḥ hāro

original: Padaṁ vicinati, pañhaṁ vicinati, visajjanaṁ vicinati, pubbāparaṁ vicinati, assādaṁ
analyzed: padam vicinati pañham vicinati visajjanam vicinati pubba aparam vicinati assāda

original: vicinati, ādīnavaṁ vicinati, nissaraṇaṁ vicinati, phalaṁ vicinati, upāyaṁ vicinati,
analyzed: vicinati ādīnavam vicinati nissaraṇam vicinati phalam vicinati upāyam vicinati

original: āṇattiṁ vicinati, anugītiṁ vicinati, sabbe nava suttante vicinati.
analyzed: āṇattim vicinati anugītim vicinati sabbe nava suttante vicinati

original: Yathā kiṁ bhave, yathā āyasmā ajito pārāyane bhagavantaṁ pañhaṁ pucchati—
analyzed: yathā kim bhave yathā bhagavantam pañham pucchati

original: Imāni cattāri padāni pucchitāni, so eko pañho.
analyzed: imāni cattāri padāni pucchitāni saḥ ekaḥ pañho
eka vatthu pariggahā evam hi āha

original: “kenassu nivuto loko”ti lokādhiṭṭhānaṁ pucchati, “kenassu nappakāsatī”ti lokassa
analyzed: nivutaḥ loko ti loka adhiṭṭhānam pucchati kenassu na ppakāsati iti lokassa

original: appakāsanaṁ pucchati, “kissābhilepanaṁ brūsī”ti lokassa abhilepanaṁ pucchati, “kiṁsu
analyzed: appakāsanam pucchati kissa abhilepanam brūsi iti lokassa abhilepanam pucchati kisu

original: tassa mahabbhayan”ti tasseva lokassa mahābhayaṁ pucchati.
analyzed: tassa mahat bhayanti tassa iva lokassa mahā bhayam pucchati
loko tividhaḥ kilesa lokaḥ bhava lokaḥ indriya loko

original: Imāni cattāri padāni imehi catūhi padehi visajjitāni paṭhamaṁ paṭhamena, dutiyaṁ dutiyena, tatiyaṁ tatiyena, catutthaṁ catutthena.
analyzed: imāni cattāri padāni imehi catūhi padehi visajjitāni paṭhamam paṭhamena dutiyam dutiyena tatiyam tatiyena catuttham catutthena

original: “Kenassu nivuto loko”ti pañhe “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti visajjanā.
analyzed: kenassu nivutaḥ loko ti pañhe avijjāya nivutaḥ loko ti visajjanā

original: Nīvaraṇehi nivuto loko, avijjānīvaraṇā hi sabbe sattā.
analyzed: nīvaraṇehi nivutaḥ lokaḥ avijjā nīvaraṇāḥ hi sabbe sattā

original: Yathāha bhagavā “sabbasattānaṁ, bhikkhave, sabbapāṇānaṁ sabbabhūtānaṁ pariyāyato ekameva nīvaraṇaṁ vadāmi yadidaṁ avijjā, avijjānīvaraṇā hi sabbe sattā.
analyzed: yathā āha bhagavā sabba sattāna bhikkhave sabba pāṇānam sabba bhūtānam pariyāyataḥ ekam eva nīvaraṇam vadāmi yat idam avijjā avijjā nīvaraṇāḥ hi sabbe sattāḥ

original: Sabbasova, bhikkhave, avijjāya nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā natthi sattānaṁ nīvaraṇanti vadāmī”ti.
analyzed: sabbaso va bhikkhave avijjāya nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā natthi sattānam nīvaraṇan ti vadāmi iti

original: Tena ca paṭhamassa padassa visajjanā yuttā.
analyzed: tena ca paṭhamassa padassa visajjanā yuttā
kenassu nappakāsati iti pañhe vivicchā pamādāḥ nappakāsati iti visajjanā

original: Yo puggalo nīvaraṇehi nivuto, so vivicchati.
analyzed: yaḥ puggalaḥ nīvaraṇehi nivutaḥ saḥ vivicchati

original: So vicikicchanto nābhisaddahati, na abhisaddahanto vīriyaṁ nārabhati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ sacchikiriyāya.
analyzed: saḥ vicikicchantaḥ na abhisaddahati na abhisaddahantaḥ vīriyam na ārabhati akusalānam dhammānam pahānāya kusalānam dhammānam sacchikiriyāya

original: So idhappamādamanuyutto viharati pamatto, sukke dhamme na uppādiyati, tassa te anuppādiyamānā nappakāsanti, yathāha bhagavā—
analyzed: saḥ idha pamādam anuyuttaḥ viharati pamattaḥ sukke dhamme na uppādiyati tassa te an uppādiyamānāḥ na pakāsanti yathā āha bhagavā

original: Tena ca dutiyassa padassa visajjanā yuttā.
analyzed: tena ca dutiyassa padassa visajjanā yuttā
kissa abhilepanam brūsi iti pañhe jappa abhilepanam brūmi iti visajjanā

original: Sāyaṁ taṇhā āsattibahulassa puggalassa “evaṁ abhijappā”ti karitvā tattha loko abhilitto nāma bhavati, tena ca tatiyassa padassa visajjanā yuttā.
analyzed: sāyam taṇhā āsatti bahulassa puggalassa evam karitvā tattha lokaḥ abhilittaḥ nāma bhavati tena ca tatiyassa padassa visajjanā yuttā

original: “Kiṁ su tassa mahabbhayan”ti pañhe “dukkhamassa mahabbhayan”ti visajjanā.
analyzed: kim su tassa mahabbhayanti pañhe dukkham assa mahabbhayanti visajjanā

original: Yaṁ kāyikaṁ idaṁ dukkhaṁ, yaṁ cetasikaṁ idaṁ domanassaṁ.
analyzed: yam kāyikam idam dukkha yam cetasikam idam domanassa

original: Sabbe sattā hi dukkhassa ubbijjanti, natthi bhayaṁ dukkhena samasamaṁ, kuto vā pana tassa uttaritaraṁ?
analyzed: sabbe sattā hi dukkhassa ubbijjanti natthi bhayam dukkhena kutas vā pana tassa uttaritara
dukkha dukkha tā saṅkhāra dukkha tā vipariṇāma dukkha tā

original: Tattha loko odhaso kadāci karahaci dukkhadukkhatāya muccati.
analyzed: tattha lokaḥ odhasaḥ kadāci karahaci dukkha dukkha tāya muccati
honti loke appa ābādhā api dīgha āyukā api

original: Saṅkhāradukkhatāya pana loko anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā muccati, tasmā saṅkhāradukkhatā dukkhaṁ lokassāti katvā dukkhamassa mahabbhayanti.
analyzed: saṅkhāra dukkha tāya pana lokaḥ anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā muccati tasmā saṅkhāra dukkha tā dukkham lokassa ati katvā dukkham assa mahabbhayanti

original: Tena ca catutthassa padassa visajjanā yuttā.
analyzed: tena ca catutthassa padassa visajjanā yuttā

original: Evaṁ samāpannassa lokassa evaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhassa kiṁ lokassa vodānaṁ vuṭṭhānamiti, evañhi āha.
analyzed: evam samāpannassa lokassa evam saṅkiliṭṭhassa kim lokassa vodānam vuṭṭhānam iti evam hi āha

original: Savanti sabbadhi sotāti asamāhitassa savanti abhijjhābyāpādappamādabahulassa.
analyzed: savanti sabbadhi sotā ati asamāhitassa savanti abhijjhā byāpāda ppamāda bahulassa

original: Tattha yā abhijjhā ayaṁ lobho akusalamūlaṁ, yo byāpādo ayaṁ doso akusalamūlaṁ, yo pamādo ayaṁ moho akusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: tattha yā abhijjhā ayam lobhaḥ akusala mūla yaḥ byāpādaḥ ayam dosaḥ akusala mūla yaḥ pamādaḥ ayam mohaḥ akusala mūla

original: Tassevaṁ asamāhitassa chasu āyatanesu taṇhā savanti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā, yathāha bhagavā—
analyzed: tassa ivam asamāhitassa chasu āyatanesu taṇhā savanti rūpa taṇhā sadda taṇhā gandha taṇhā rasa taṇhā phoṭṭhabba taṇhā dhamma taṇhā yathā āha bhagavā

original: “Savatī”ti ca kho, bhikkhave, channetaṁ ajjhattikānaṁ āyatanānaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: savati iti ca kho bhikkhave channa itam ajjhattikānam āyatanānam adhivacana

original: Cakkhu savati manāpikesu rūpesu, amanāpikesu paṭihaññatīti.
analyzed: cakkhu savati manāpikesu rūpesu amanāpikesu paṭihaññati iti

original: mano savati manāpikesu dhammesu amanāpikesu paṭihaññatīti.
analyzed: manaḥ savati manāpikesu dhammesu amanāpikesu paṭihaññati iti

original: Iti sabbā ca savati, sabbathā ca savati.
analyzed: iti sabbā ca savati sabbathā ca savati
tena āha savanti sabbadhi sotā iti

original: “Sotānaṁ kiṁ nivāraṇan”ti pariyuṭṭhānavighātaṁ pucchati, idaṁ vodānaṁ.
analyzed: sotānam kim pariyuṭṭhāna vighātam pucchati idam vodāna

original: “Sotānaṁ saṁvaraṁ brūhi, kena sotā pidhīyare”ti anusayasamugghātaṁ pucchati, idaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: sotānam savaram brūhi kena sotā anusaya samugghātam pucchati idam vuṭṭhāna

original: Kāyagatāya satiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya cakkhu nāviñchati manāpikesu rūpesu, amanāpikesu na paṭihaññati, sotaṁ …pe…
analyzed: kāyagatāya satiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya cakkhu na āviñchati manāpikesu rūpesu amanāpikesu na paṭihaññati sotam pe

original: mano nāviñchati manāpikesu dhammesu, amanāpikesu na paṭihaññati.
analyzed: manaḥ na āviñchati manāpikesu dhammesu amanāpikesu na paṭihaññati

original: Paññāya anusayā pahīyanti, anusayesu pahīnesu pariyuṭṭhānā pahīyanti.
analyzed: paññāya anusayā pahīyanti anusayesu pahīnesu pariyuṭṭhānā pahīyanti

original: Taṁ yathā khandhavantassa rukkhassa anavasesamūluddharaṇe kate pupphaphalapallavaṅkurasantati samucchinnā bhavati.
analyzed: tam yathā khandhavantassa rukkhassa anavasesa mūla uddharaṇe kate puppha phala palla vaṅkura santati samucchinnā bhavati

original: Evaṁ anusayesu pahīnesu pariyuṭṭhānasantati samucchinnā bhavati pidahitā paṭicchannā.
analyzed: evam anusayesu pahīnesu pariyuṭṭhāna santati samucchinnā bhavati pidahitā paṭicchannā

original: Tīṇi ca saccāni saṅkhatāni nirodhadhammāni dukkhaṁ samudayo maggo, nirodho asaṅkhato.
analyzed: tīṇi ca saccāni saṅkhatāni nirodha dhammāni dukkham samudayaḥ maggaḥ nirodho asaṅkhataḥ

original: Tattha samudayo dvīsu bhūmīsu pahīyati dassanabhūmiyā ca bhāvanābhūmiyā ca.
analyzed: tattha samudayaḥ dvīsu bhūmīsu pahīyati dassana bhūmiyā ca bhāvanā bhūmiyā ca

original: Dassanena tīṇi saṁyojanāni pahīyanti sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso,
analyzed: dassanena tīṇi sayojanāni pahīyanti sakkāya diṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbata parāmāso

original: bhāvanāya satta saṁyojanāni pahīyanti kāmacchando byāpādo rūparāgo arūparāgo māno
analyzed: bhāvanāya satta sayojanāni pahīyanti kāmacchandaḥ byāpādaḥ rūpa rāgaḥ a rūpa rāgaḥ mānaḥ

original: Tedhātuke imāni dasa saṁyojanāni pañcorambhāgiyāni pañcuddhambhāgiyāni.
analyzed: tedhātuke imāni dasa sayojanāni pañca orambhāgiyāni pañca uddhambhāgiyāni

original: Tattha tīṇi saṁyojanāni sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ adhiṭṭhāya nirujjhanti.
analyzed: tattha tīṇi sayojanāni sakkāya diṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ anaññātaññassāmī iti indriyam adhiṭṭhāya nirujjhanti

original: Satta saṁyojanāni kāmacchando byāpādo rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṁ avijjāvasesā aññindriyaṁ adhiṭṭhāya nirujjhanti.
analyzed: satta sayojanāni kāmacchandaḥ byāpādaḥ rūpa rāgaḥ arūpa rāgaḥ mānaḥ uddhaccam avijjā avasesāḥ aññindriyam adhiṭṭhāya nirujjhanti

original: Yaṁ pana evaṁ jānāti “khīṇā me jātī”ti, idaṁ khaye ñāṇaṁ.
analyzed: yam pana evam jānāti khīṇā me jātī iti idam
na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāti idam anuppāde ñāṇa

original: Tattha yañca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ yañca aññindriyaṁ, imāni aggaphalaṁ arahattaṁ
analyzed: tattha yat ca anaññātaññassāmi itindriyam yat ca aññindriye imāni agga phalam

original: pāpuṇantassa nirujjhanti, tattha yañca khaye ñāṇaṁ yañca anuppāde ñāṇaṁ, imāni dve ñāṇāni ekapaññā.
analyzed: pāpuṇantassa nirujjhanti tattha yat ca khaye ñāṇam yat ca anuppāde ñāṇe imāni dve ñāṇāni eka paññā

original: Api ca ārammaṇasaṅketena dve nāmāni labbhanti, “khīṇā me jātī”ti pajānantassa khaye ñāṇanti nāmaṁ labhati, “nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti pajānantassa anuppāde ñāṇanti nāmaṁ labhati.
analyzed: api ca ārammaṇa saṅketena dve nāmāni labbhanti khīṇā me jātī iti pajānantassa khaye ñāṇanti nāmam labhati na aparam itthattāya ati pajānantassa anuppāde ñāṇanti nāmam labhati

original: Sā pajānanaṭṭhena paññā, yathādiṭṭhaṁ apilāpanaṭṭhena sati.
analyzed: sā pajānana ṭhena paññā yathādiṭṭham apilāpana ṭṭhena sati
tattha ye pañca upādāna kkhandhāḥ idam nāma rūpa

original: Tattha ye phassapañcamakā dhammā, idaṁ nāmaṁ.
analyzed: tattha ye phassa pañcamakāḥ dhammāḥ idam nāma

original: Tadubhayaṁ nāmarūpaṁ viññāṇasampayuttaṁ tassa nirodhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pucchanto āyasmā ajito pārāyane evamāha—
analyzed: tat ubhayam nāma rūpam viññāṇa sampayuttam tassa nirodham bhagavantam pucchantaḥ āyasmanto ajitaḥ pārāyane evam āha

original: Tattha sati ca paññā ca cattāri indriyāni, sati dve indriyāni satindriyañca samādhindriyañca, paññā dve indriyāni paññindriyañca vīriyindriyañca.
analyzed: tattha sati ca paññā ca cattāri indriyāni sati dve indriyāni satindriyañca samādhindriyañca paññā dve indriyāni paññindriyañca vīriyindriyañca

original: Yā imesu catūsu indriyesu saddahanā okappanā, idaṁ saddhindriyaṁ.
analyzed: yāḥ imesu catūsu indriyesu saddahanāḥ okappanāḥ idam saddhindriya

original: Tattha yā saddhādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṁ chandasamādhi.
analyzed: tattha yā saddhā ādhipateyyā citta ekagga tā ayam chanda samādhi

original: Samāhite citte kilesānaṁ vikkhambhanatāya paṭisaṅkhānabalena vā bhāvanābalena vā, idaṁ pahānaṁ.
analyzed: samāhite citte kilesānam vikkhambhana tāya paṭisaṅkhāna balena vā bhāvanā balena vā idam pahāna

original: Tattha ye assāsapassāsā vitakkavicārā saññāvedayitā sarasaṅkappā, ime saṅkhārā.
analyzed: tattha ye assāsa passāsāḥ vitakka vicārā saññā vedayitā sara saṅkappāḥ ime saṅkhārā

original: Iti purimako ca chandasamādhi, kilesavikkhambhanatāya ca pahānaṁ ime ca saṅkhārā,
analyzed: iti ca chanda samādhi kilesa vikkhambhana tāya ca pahānam ime ca saṅkhārāḥ
tat ubhayam chanda samādhi ppadhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti viveka nissita
virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmi

original: Tattha yā vīriyādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṁ vīriyasamādhi …pe…
analyzed: tattha yā vīriya ādhipateyyā citta ekagga tā ayam vīriya samādhi

original: tattha yā cittādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṁ cittasamādhi …pe…
analyzed: tattha yā citta ādhipateyyā citta ekagga tā ayam citta samādhi

original: tattha yā vīmaṁsādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṁ vīmaṁsāsamādhi.
analyzed: tattha yā vīmasā ādhipateyyā citta ekagga tā ayam vīmasā samādhi

original: Samāhite citte kilesānaṁ vikkhambhanatāya paṭisaṅkhānabalena vā bhāvanābalena vā, idaṁ pahānaṁ.
analyzed: samāhite citte kilesānam vikkhambhana tāya paṭisaṅkhāna balena vā bhāvanā balena vā idam pahāna

original: Tattha ye assāsapassāsā vitakkavicārā saññāvedayitā sarasaṅkappā, ime saṅkhārā.
analyzed: tattha ye assāsa passāsāḥ vitakka vicārā saññā vedayitā sara saṅkappāḥ ime saṅkhārā

original: Iti purimako ca vīmaṁsāsamādhi, kilesavikkhambhanatāya ca pahānaṁ ime ca saṅkhārā,
analyzed: iti ca kilesa vikkhambhana tāya ca pahānam ime ca saṅkhārāḥ
tat ubhayam vīmasā samādhi ppadhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāveti viveka nissita
virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmi
sabbaḥ samādhi ñāṇa mūlakaḥ ñāṇa pubbaṅgamaḥ ñāṇa anuparivatti

original: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṁ cittaṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: iti vivaṭena cetasā a pariyonaddhena sa pabhāsam cittam bhāveti

original: Pañcindriyāni kusalāni cittasahabhūni citte uppajjamāne uppajjanti, citte nirujjhamāne nirujjhanti.
analyzed: pañca indriyāni kusalāni citta sahabhūni citte uppajjamāne uppajjanti citte nirujjhamāne nirujjhanti

original: Nāmarūpañca viññāṇahetukaṁ viññāṇapaccayā nibbattaṁ, tassa maggena hetu upacchinno, viññāṇaṁ anāhāraṁ anabhinanditaṁ appaṭisandhikaṁ taṁ nirujjhati.
analyzed: nāma rūpam ca viññāṇa hetukam viññāṇa paccayā tassa maggena hetu upacchinno viññāṇam anāhāram an abhinanditam appaṭisandhikam tam nirujjhati

original: Nāmarūpamapi ahetu appaccayaṁ punabbhavaṁ na nibbattayati.
analyzed: nāma rūpam api ahetu appaccayam punabbhavam na nibbattayati

original: Evaṁ viññāṇassa nirodhā paññā ca sati ca nāmarūpañca nirujjhati.
analyzed: evam viññāṇassa nirodhā paññā ca sati ca nāma rūpam ca nirujjhati

original: Imāni tīṇi padāni pucchitāni, te tayo pañhā.
analyzed: imāni tīṇi padāni pucchitāni te tayo pañhā
sekha asekha vipassanā pubbaṅgama pahāna yogena evam hi āha

original: “Ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse”ti arahattaṁ pucchati, “ye ca sekkhā puthū idhā”ti sekhaṁ pucchati, “tesaṁ me nipako iriyaṁ, puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisā”ti vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṁ pahānaṁ pucchati.
analyzed: ye ca saṅkhāta dhammāse ti arahattam pucchati ye ca sekkhā puthū idha ati sekham pucchati tesam me nipakaḥ puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisa ati vipassanā pubbaṅgamam pahānam pucchati

original: Bhagavato sabbaṁ kāyakammaṁ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṁ ñāṇānuparivatti, sabbaṁ vacīkammaṁ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṁ ñāṇānuparivatti, sabbaṁ manokammaṁ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṁ ñāṇānuparivatti.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ sabbam kāya kammam ñāṇa pubbaṅgamam ñāṇa anuparivatti sabbam vacī kammam ñāṇa pubbaṅgamam ñāṇa anuparivatti sabbam manaḥ kammam ñāṇa pubbaṅgamam ñāṇa anuparivatti

original: Atīte aṁse appaṭihatañāṇadassanaṁ, anāgate aṁse appaṭihatañāṇadassanaṁ, paccuppanne aṁse appaṭihatañāṇadassanaṁ.
analyzed: atīte ase appaṭihata ñāṇa dassana anāgate ase appaṭihata ñāṇa dassana paccuppanne ase appaṭihata ñāṇa dassana

original: Yaṁ anicce dukkhe anattani ca aññāṇaṁ adassanaṁ, ayaṁ ñāṇadassanassa paṭighāto.
analyzed: yam anicce dukkhe anattani ca aññāṇam a dassana ayam ñāṇa dassanassa paṭighāto

original: Yathā idha puriso tārakarūpāni passeyya, no ca gaṇanasaṅketena jāneyya, ayaṁ ñāṇadassanassa paṭighāto.
analyzed: yathā idha puriso tāraka rūpāni passeyya no ca gaṇana saṅketena jāneyya ayam ñāṇa dassanassa paṭighāto

original: Bhagavato pana appaṭihatañāṇadassanaṁ, anāvaraṇañāṇadassanā hi buddhā bhagavanto.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ pana appaṭihata ñāṇa dassana anāvaraṇa ñāṇa dassanāḥ hi buddhāḥ bhagavanto

original: Tattha sekhena dvīsu dhammesu cittaṁ rakkhitabbaṁ gedhā ca rajanīyesu dhammesu, dosā ca pariyuṭṭhānīyesu.
analyzed: tattha sekhena dvīsu dhammesu cittam rakkhitabbam gedhā ca rajanīyesu dhammesu dosā ca pariyuṭṭhānīyesu

original: Tattha yā icchā mucchā patthanā piyāyanā kīḷanā, taṁ bhagavā nivārento evamāha—
analyzed: tattha yā icchā mucchā patthanā piyāyanā kīḷanā tam bhagavā nivārentaḥ evam āha
manasā anāvilaḥ siyā ti pariyuṭṭhāna vighātam āha

original: Tathā hi sekho abhigijjhanto asamuppannañca kilesaṁ uppādeti, uppannañca kilesaṁ phātiṁ karoti.
analyzed: tathā hi sekhaḥ abhigijjhantaḥ asamuppannam ca kilesam uppādeti uppannam ca kilesam phātim karoti

original: Yo pana anāvilasaṅkappo anabhigijjhanto vāyamati, so anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
analyzed: yaḥ pana anāvila saṅkappaḥ an abhigijjhantaḥ vāyamati saḥ anuppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam an uppādāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: So uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
analyzed: so uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam pahānāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: So anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
analyzed: saḥ anuppannānam kusalānam dhammānam uppādāya chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: So uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
analyzed: so uppannānam kusalānam dhammānam ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandam janeti vāyamati vīriyam ārabhati cittam paggaṇhāti padahati

original: Kāmavitakko byāpādavitakko vihiṁsāvitakko, ime anuppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā.
analyzed: kāma vitakkaḥ byāpāda vitakkaḥ vihisā vitakkaḥ ime anuppannāḥ pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Anusayā akusalamūlāni, ime uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā.
analyzed: anusayāḥ akusala mūlāni ime uppannā pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ dhammā

original: Yāni sotāpannassa indriyāni, ime anuppannā kusalā dhammā.
analyzed: yāni sotāpannassa indriyāni ime anuppannā kusalā dhammā

original: Yāni aṭṭhamakassa indriyāni, ime uppannā kusalā dhammā.
analyzed: yāni aṭṭhamakassa indriyāni ime uppannā kusalā dhammā
yena byāpāda vitakkam idam samādhi indriya

original: Yena uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti nādhivāseti, idaṁ paññindriyaṁ.
analyzed: yena uppanna uppanne pāpake akusale dhamme pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvam gameti na adhivāseti idam paññindriya

original: Yā imesu catūsu indriyesu saddahanā okappanā, idaṁ saddhindriyaṁ.
analyzed: yāḥ imesu catūsu indriyesu saddahanāḥ okappanāḥ idam saddhindriya

original: Evaṁ sekho sabbehi kusalehi dhammehi appamatto vutto bhagavatā anāvilatāya manasā.
analyzed: evam sekhaḥ sabbehi kusalehi dhammehi appamattaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā anāvila tāya manasā
tena āha bhagavān manasā anāvilaḥ siyāti

original: “Kusalo sabbadhammānan”ti loko nāma tividho kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyaloko.
analyzed: kusalo sabba dhammānam ti lokaḥ nāma tividhaḥ kilesa lokaḥ bhava lokaḥ indriya loko

original: Tattha kilesalokena bhavaloko samudāgacchati, so indriyāni nibbatteti, indriyesu bhāviyamānesu neyyassa pariññā bhavati.
analyzed: tattha kilesa lokena bhava lokaḥ samudāgacchati saḥ indriyāni indriyesu bhāviyamānesu pariññā bhavati

original: Sā duvidhena upaparikkhitabbā dassanapariññāya ca bhāvanāpariññāya ca.
analyzed: sā duvidhena upaparikkhitabbā dassana pariññāya ca bhāvanā pariññāya ca

original: Yadā hi sekho ñeyyaṁ parijānāti, tadā nibbidāsahagatehi saññāmanasikārehi neyyaṁ pariññātaṁ bhavati.
analyzed: yadā hi sekhaḥ ñeyyam parijānāti tadā nibbidā sahagatehi saññā manasikārehi neyyam pariññātam bhavati

original: Yaṁ dhammānaṁ salakkhaṇe ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā ca atthapaṭisambhidā ca, ayaṁ abhiññā.
analyzed: yam dhammānam salakkhaṇe ñāṇam dhamma paṭisambhidā ca attha paṭisambhidā ca ayam abhiññā

original: Evaṁ abhijānitvā yā parijānanā “idaṁ kusalaṁ, idaṁ akusalaṁ, idaṁ sāvajjaṁ, idaṁ
analyzed: evam abhijānitvā yā parijānanā idam kusalaḥ idam akusalaḥ idam sa avajjaḥ

original: anavajjaṁ, idaṁ kaṇhaṁ, idaṁ sukkaṁ, idaṁ sevitabbaṁ, idaṁ na sevitabbaṁ, ime dhammā
analyzed: anavajjaḥ idam kaṇhaḥ idam sukkaḥ idam sevitabbaḥ idam na sevitabbaḥ ime dhammā

original: evaṅgahitā, idaṁ phalaṁ nibbattenti, tesaṁ evaṅgahitānaṁ ayaṁ attho”ti, ayaṁ pariññā.
analyzed: evaṅgahitāḥ idam phalam nibbattenti tesam evaṅgahitānam ayam atthaḥ ti ayam pariññā

original: Evaṁ parijānitvā tayo dhammā avasiṭṭhā bhavanti pahātabbā bhāvetabbā sacchikātabbā ca.
analyzed: evam parijānitvā tayo dhammā avasiṭṭhāḥ bhavanti pahātabbā bhāvetabbā sacchikātabbā ca

original: Yo evaṁ jānāti ayaṁ vuccati atthakusalo dhammakusalo kalyāṇatākusalo phalatākusalo,
analyzed: yaḥ evam jānāti ayam vuccati attha kusalaḥ dhamma kusalaḥ kalyāṇa tā kusalo phala tā kusalo

original: āyakusalo apāyakusalo upāyakusalo mahatā kosallena samannāgatoti, tenāha bhagavā
analyzed: āya kusalaḥ apāya kusalaḥ upāya kusalaḥ mahatā kosallena samannāgataḥ iti tena āha bhagavā

original: “Sato bhikkhu paribbaje”ti tena diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṁ abhikkante paṭikkante
analyzed: sataḥ bhikkhu paribbajeti tena diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra attham abhikkante paṭikkante

original: ālokite vilokite samiñjite pasārite saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe asite pīte khāyite
analyzed: ālokite vilokite samiñjite pasārite saṅghāṭi patta cīvara dhāraṇe asite pīte khāyite

original: sāyite uccārapassāvakamme gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhibhāve satena
analyzed: sāyite uccāra passāva kamme gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhi bhāve satena

original: Imā dve cariyā anuññātā bhagavatā ekā visuddhānaṁ, ekā visujjhantānaṁ.
analyzed: imāḥ dve cariyāḥ anuññātāḥ bhagavatā ekā visuddhāna ekā visujjhantāna

original: Yaṁ bojjhaṁ, taṁ catubbidhaṁ dukkhassa pariññābhisamayena samudayassa pahānābhisamayena
analyzed: yam bojjha tam catubbidham dukkhassa pariññā abhisamayena samudayassa pahāna abhisamayena

original: maggassa bhāvanābhisamayena nirodhassa sacchikiriyābhisamayena, idaṁ catubbidhaṁ
analyzed: maggassa bhāvanā abhisamayena nirodhassa sacchikiriyā abhisamayena idam catubbidha

original: bojjhaṁ yo evaṁ jānāti, ayaṁ vuccati sato abhikkamati sato paṭikkamati khayā rāgassa
analyzed: bojjham yaḥ evam jānāti ayam vuccati sataḥ abhikkamati sataḥ paṭikkamati khayā rāgassa
tena āha bhagavā sataḥ bhikkhu paribbajeti tena āha

original: Suttassa ca anugīti atthato ca byañjanato ca samānetabbā.
analyzed: suttassa ca anugīti atthataḥ ca byañjanataḥ ca samānetabbā
attha apagatam hi byañjanam samphappalāpam bhavati

original: Dunnikkhittassa padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo bhavati, tasmā atthabyañjanūpetaṁ saṅgāyitabbaṁ.
analyzed: dunnikkhittassa pada byañjanassa atthaḥ api dunnayaḥ bhavati tasmai attha byañjana upetam

original: Kiṁ idaṁ suttaṁ āhacca vacanaṁ anusandhivacanaṁ nītatthaṁ neyyatthaṁ saṅkilesabhāgiyaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ asekkhabhāgiyaṁ?
analyzed: kim idam suttam vacanam anusandhi vacanam nīta attham neyya attham saṅkilesa bhāgiyam nibbedha bhāgiyam asekkha bhāgiya

original: Kuhiṁ imassa suttassa sabbāni saccāni passitabbāni, ādimajjhapariyosāneti?
analyzed: kuhim imassa suttassa sabbāni saccāni passitabbāni ādi majjha pariyosāne ti

original: “yaṁ pucchitañca vissajjitañca, suttassa yā ca anugītī”ti.
analyzed: yam pucchitam ca vissajjitam ca suttassa yā ca anugīti iti
